video.title: GVTV News 07-31-08 NCTV11
video.description:
GVTV News is broadcast 5 days a week on comcast cable NCTV Public Access Television at 3:00 p.m. and 7:30 p.m. pst.Â  It is also produced and aired by Grass Valley Television at www.gvtelevision.com and www.gvtv.org 7 days a week online.

You can get a free podcast thru itunes and rss feed and cellphone access available.

Anchors are Elisse Garner and Randy Hansen

Producer: Randy Hansen

Contact 530-477-3309
email: news@gmail.com
